description: <p>Are you looking for a change of scene?  Welshpool Medical Centre situated on the Powys/Shropshire border requires a Dispensary Manager.  An important role, which will involve working with a team of highly skilled, knowledgeable and committed Dispensers.  The importance of this role will compliment the good work of the existing multi-disciplinary team.</p>

hiringOrganization.name: GP Practices - Powys Teaching Health Board

title: Pharmacy Technician
